name: TC
0:
”Alexa, launch TC”
”Alexa, ask TC to run Calculator on Laptop”
”Alexa, tell TC to open Notepad on Office PC”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. c.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
TRIGGERcmd allows you to run commands on your computers remotely.

This new TC skill works like the "TRIGGERcmd" and "TRIGGER command" skills, but with a simpler name. 

Most people should start with the "TRIGGERcmd Smart Home" skill that creates a virtual smart home device for each of your commands. It does the best job of matching your words to your commands. 

To get started, create an account at www.triggercmd.com.
